title: Graph shows normal profit at price of $6

content.description: The following questions refer to the graph below showing cost curves for a perfectly competitive firm.
content.question: At market price $6, the profit-maximizing rate of output will result in

choices.label: profits that are less than normal
profits that are greater than normal

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
